3.name: Approximately
3.desc: The measurement is approximately equal to that specified.

4.name: Equal to
4.desc: The measurement is equal to that specified.

5.name: Greater than or equal to
5.desc: The measurement is greater than or equal to that specified.

6.name: Greater than
6.desc: The measurement is greater than that specified.

7.name: Less than
7.desc: The measurement is less than that specified.

8.name: Less than or equal to
8.desc: The measurement is less than or equal to that specified.

9.name: Average value
9.desc: Average value for a specific series of readings.

10.name: Not equal to
10.desc: The measurement is not equal to that specified.

12.name: True value
12.desc: The measurement reported is a true value.

13.name: Observed value
13.desc: The measurement reported is an observed value.

14.name: Marked
14.desc: The measurement marked on the object.

15.name: Out of range
15.desc: The measurement reported is out of range.
